name: Esoteric (Elizard)
description:
Esoteric adjective /ˌesəˈterɪk/

Likely to be understood or enjoyed by only a few people with a special knowledge or interest.

This game was conceptualised as an art-jam project, having taken great influence from the artwork ‘Kalipinypa’ by Charlotte Phillipus Napurrula (2018). NGV artwork page.

This experience stems as an abstract autobiographical text and holds a lot of weight to my own feeling, thoughts and experiences with depression and anxiety.

Controls

Movement - WASD
Look - Mouse
Interact / select - Left mouse button
